img_text: 6:41 1 Champions LTE Tweet Brian Krassenstein @krassenstein Just a heads up If you are going send a direct message to me with a physical threat in it, I will not hesitate to: a) Forward it to my FBI contact b) Post your threat along with your name and picture to my 660k followers c) Contact your employer to get their opinion 4:30 PM 3/17/19 TweetDeck 3,087 Retweets 20.1K Likes Tweet your reply
